snippet.title: Kate: Collateral Damage
snippet.description:
Hey everyone, we are proud to announce our new game based on the Netflix film. You are Kate, a deadly assassin on a quest for revenge against the Yakuza crime boss that lethally poisoned you. Battle your way through the Tokyo criminal underground in this time-attack, action roguelike.
Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1623000/Kate_Collateral_Damage/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/StudioLudic
Music by: https://soundcloud.com/cybass
